typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		GKEY as string,
		UYV_GKEY as string,
		UNIT_ID as string,
		DECKING_TYPE as string,
		NODE_ID as string,
		YARD as string,
		FROM_POS_LOCTYPE as string,
		FROM_POS_LOCID as string,
		FROM_POS_LOC_GKEY as string,
		FROM_POS_SLOT as string,
		FROM_POS_NAME as string,
		FROM_POS_BIN as string,
		FROM_POS_TIER as string,
		TO_POS_LOCTYPE as string,
		TO_POS_LOCID as string,
		TO_POS_LOC_GKEY as string,
		TO_POS_SLOT as string,
		TO_POS_NAME as string,
		TO_POS_BIN as string,
		TO_POS_TIER as string,
		TOTAL_SCORE as string,
		EXECUTION_TIME as string,
		PHASE as string,
		TIME_STAMP as string
	),
	useSchema: false,
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	moveFiles: ['bronze/deckinghistory/load','bronze/deckinghistory/archive'],
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'bhct',
	folderPath: 'bronze/deckinghistory/load',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	dateFormats: ['dd-MM-yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss.SSS\'Z\'','yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss\'Z\''],
	mode: 'read') ~> CSV
Aggregate1 derive(time_stamp = :timestamp,
		Year = year(:timestamp),
		Month = month(:timestamp),
		Week = weekOfYear(:timestamp),
		timestamp := coalesce(toTimestamp(split(time_stamp,".")[1],'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(split(time_stamp,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(split(time_stamp,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'),toTimestamp(split(time_stamp,".")[1],'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss'))) ~> DataTypeConversion
Select2 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			regexReplace($$,' ','_') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(gkey),
	each(match(name!='gkey'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate1
CSV select(mapColumn(
		gkey = GKEY,
		uyv_gkey = UYV_GKEY,
		unit_id = UNIT_ID,
		time_stamp = TIME_STAMP,
		decking_type = DECKING_TYPE,
		node_id = NODE_ID,
		yard = YARD,
		from_pos_loctype = FROM_POS_LOCTYPE,
		from_pos_locid = FROM_POS_LOCID,
		from_pos_loc_gkey = FROM_POS_LOC_GKEY,
		from_pos_slot = FROM_POS_SLOT,
		from_pos_name = FROM_POS_NAME,
		from_pos_bin = FROM_POS_BIN,
		from_pos_tier = FROM_POS_TIER,
		from_pos_loctype = FROM_POS_LOCTYPE,
		to_pos_locid = TO_POS_LOCID,
		to_pos_loctype = TO_POS_LOCTYPE,
		to_pos_loc_gkey = TO_POS_LOC_GKEY,
		to_pos_slot = TO_POS_SLOT,
		to_pos_name = TO_POS_NAME,
		to_pos_bin = TO_POS_BIN,
		to_pos_tier = TO_POS_TIER,
		total_score = TOTAL_SCORE,
		execution_time = EXECUTION_TIME,
		phase = PHASE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
filter1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
DataTypeConversion filter(not(isNull(gkey)) && not(isNull(time_stamp))) ~> filter1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'bhct',
	folderPath: 'silver/deckings',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: true,
	optimizedWrite: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable: false,
	insertable: false,
	updateable: false,
	upsertable: true,
	keys:['gkey'],
	umask: 0777,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		1,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week
	)) ~> sink2
